column5: na wɔhyehyɛɛ mbobowano ahwɛfo na adwontofo na Levifo no
column8: na Hanania aban no mu ambrado wɔ Jerusalɛm do: na ɔyɛ ɔbarimba nokwafo

column3: Mma hom mma wommbuebue Jerusalɛm nkuropon kɛpem dɛ ewia ano bɛyɛ hyew ana; na mber a wogyina apata mu no
column5: na hom ntotow ekyir: na wonyi Jerusalɛm mba no bi aweɔmfo nsisi hɔ
column7: na obiara ngyina ne fi tsentsendo."

column2: "Afei kurow no mu tserɛw na ɔso: na ɔman no suar wɔ mu
"Na me Nyankopɔn dze hyɛɛ m’akoma mu dɛ mompon ekunyin
column5: ma wɔnkan hɔn ebusuasantsen. Na muhun hɔn a wodzii kan bae no hɔn ebusuasantsen nwoma
column6: na muhun dɛ wɔakyerɛw wɔ mu dɛ:"

column2: "Woyinom nye ɔmansin no mu mba a wofi ndɔmmumkɔfo no a Babilɔnhen Nebukadenezar faa hɔn kɔree no mu fowee bae
column3: na wɔsanee baa Jerusalɛm na Juda
column4: obiara kɔr no kurow mu no a"

column13: Baana bae no. Israel ɔman mu mbarimba dodow nye yi:"

column3: na Solomon no nkowaa mba no

column2: "Na woyinom nye hɔn a wofi Tel-mela
column6: na Immer bae no: na woenntum annkyerɛ hɔn egyanom efiefi; na hɔn asɔfo so

column4: Barzillai (a ɔwaar Gileadnyi Barzillai ne mbabaa mu bi
column5: na wɔdze hɔn dzin too no no ne mba.)"

column2: "Woyinom hwehwɛɛ hɔn ebusua nwoma wɔ hɔn a wɔnam ananakan do buu hɔn ano no mu
column3: naaso woennhu: dɛm ntsi wobuu hɔn ahoɔfifo na wotuu hɔn fii asɔfodze no mu."

column2: "Na ambrado no see hɔn dɛ mma wonndzi krɔnkrɔndze mu adzekrɔnkrɔn no bi
column3: ma onkodu dɛ ɔsɔfo bi dze Urim na Tummim begyina hɔ."

column2: "Mboanofo kuw no nyina yɛ mpemeduanan ebien ahaasa eduosia
column4: "ɔsor hɔn nkowaa na hɔn mfonabaa a hɔn so wɔyɛ mpemesuon ahaasa eduasa esuon: na wɔwɔ mbanyin na mbasiafo adwontofo ahaenu eduanan enum."

column2: "Hɔn mpɔnkɔ yɛ ahaesuon eduasa esia; hɔn asoasompɔnkɔ
"Na egyanom efiefi etsitsir no mu binom bɛkyekyɛɛ edwuma no ho adze. Ambrado no maa sika  darik   apem
column4: asɔfo ntar ahaenum eduasa dɛ wɔmfa ngu adzekoradze no mu."

column2: "Na egyanom etsitsir no mu binom guguu edwuma no ho adzekoradze no mu sika  darik   mpemeduonu
"Na dza ɔman no nkaa no wɔdze mae no nye sika  darik   mpemeduonu

column8: tsenatsenaa hɔn nkurow mu. Na aber a bosoom a otsia esuon no durii no
column9: nna Israelmba no wowɔ hɔn nkurow mu."
